headline: Is Berkshire Hathaway Still a Bargain After This Week’s 1.5% Share Price Gain?
summary: Wondering what Berkshire Hathaway is really worth? Whether you are a seasoned investor or just Berkshire-curious, you are not alone in asking what makes the stock so attractive at its current price. The stock has been on a steady climb, rising 1.5% over the past week, up 2.4% for the month, gaining 11.8% year-to-date, delivering 7.6% over the last year, and an impressive 115.6% in the last five years.
